product_name: WD-40 BIKE Dry Chain Bike Lube - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Dusty singletrack and sun-scorched trails aren't easy on your drivetrain! Keep your components operating smoothly in dry and arid conditions with the 4 fl. oz. size of WD-40 BIKE Dry Chain bike lube. WD-40 BIKE Dry Chain bike lube uses special polymers that form a dry film to protect chain and repel dirt in arid or dusty conditions to maintain a clean, quiet drivetrain.
short_description: Dusty singletrack and sun-scorched trails aren't easy on your drivetrain! Keep your components operating smoothly in dry and arid conditions with the 4 fl. oz. size of WD-40 BIKE Dry Chain bike lube.
